item.title: NSA.JS
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: We’ve all been there, trying to “guess” what the user did on our web site, how he really used and experienced it, and faced with funnels,heat-maps and graphs. I’m going to explore a way to fully track a user interaction with a website, i’m not talking the heat-map, funnels type of tracking. but more of […]
item.content:encoded:
We’ve all been there, trying to “guess” what the user did on our web site, how he really used and experienced it, and faced with funnels,heat-maps and graphs.

I’m going to explore a way to fully track a user interaction with a website, i’m not talking the heat-map, funnels type of tracking. but more of a screen capture.

Using the new Mutation Observer API as a way to record dom modifications, NodeJS as a back-end i’m going to walk through a way to record and create a video of the user browsing experience on a site.
